Title: Increases certain course hours and periods of supervision for certain real estate license applications
Summary: Increases necessary course hours to 150 and necessary years of supervision to five years for real estate brokers applying for a license; requires six hours of instruction pertaining to fair housing and/or discrimination in the sale or rental of real property or an interest in real property for real estate salesmen applying for a license.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to increasing certain course hours and periods of supervision for certain real estate license applications
